text: A femtosecond is one billionth of one millionth, or one quadrillionth of a second. It can be written as 10-15 second. Even shorter than this is an attosecond. * 200 femtoseconds - the fastest chemical reactions * 300 femtoseconds - how long it takes for the atoms of an iodine molecule to vibrate Category:Orders of magnitude Category:Units of time
title: Femtosecond
